===Noun===

# A reddish-brown powder used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] that may be prescribed internally with water or wine, or applied externally with wine or vinegar to "soothe the tendons, promote blood circulation, remove stasis and relieve pain for traumatic injuries, blood stasis or sprains."
